website_summaries.verdict: Crafted with premium medical-grade stainless steel that provides durability and reduces friction for sensitive support.
pros: Whether you're a health care professional such as a physical therapist or looking for home use, this tool is for you
This soft tissue massage tool was developed to assist in effective treatment of adhesions and scarring due to surgeries, injuries, and overuse of muscles

Use the double-beveled edges to reduce muscle soreness, improve recovery times, and treat soft tissue damage.This design is idea for use on smaller to medium-sized areas of the body such as the back, forearms, neck, calves, and pectoral muscles
cons: A handful of users thought it was too dull

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This tool has already relieved pain and discomfort from shoulder surgery scar tissue. Also great tool for muscle tension release all over body. I suggest YouTube videos for teaching a variety of uses.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Cheep aluminum crap with a poor finish!
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertized as stainless steel....it is not! This product is made of aluminum. If I had known the truth I would not have purchaced it. Aluminum is softer, less durable and will oxidize over time. It also would not let me submit my review without me giving a star rating based on irrelevant points. They lied about the product and it's quality then doop you into a rating base on how easy it is to hold and use and on pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this on small areas of my hand, and it fits well in the little gaps that I need to work out. I love the options for working large areas like the entire shoulder at once, or small areas like between the first and second knuckles on my hand. The carrying pouch it comes with is also nice quality and keeps me from losing it in my drawer!
customer_reviews.author: MetroHippieMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Massage Therapist and I recently started to use Gua Sha in my practice. I love this tool. It’s well made and sturdy and works great. I’ve had a lot of positive feedback from my clients! I just bought a second one last week.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Clay

customer_reviews.title: it's better than the plastic models
customer_reviews.text: This tool isn't as cheap as some on the market, but since it's stainless, and there's no give in the material, it's better than the plastic models.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R.

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was spending a lot of money to go to Pysiccal Therapy to have someone use this tool for my muscle spasms and IT band issues. I gave it 3 stars because it doesn’t have as sharp an edge and I don’t get the same relief as I do with the PT office. If this edge wasn’t so rounded, it would give much better relief.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: Relieves tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: This gave me the first bit of relief from tendonitis. I suffered several months.
customer_reviews.author: NYboxer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Used some massage oil and rubbed this on my neck. It digs in and gets the knots out! Not sharp and has a good grip. Eliminated my migraine that was coming from super tense neck muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific addition to therapy tools
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great scraper for self use on adhesions!
customer_reviews.author: TuneCollector

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool really gets into deep without hurting
customer_reviews.text: As a massage therapist I find this tool wonderful to work on clients and myself. Get in nice and deep with out hurting or injuring.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect it to work so quickly
customer_reviews.text: .... didn't expect it to work so quickly. UPS delivered coincidentally when my back and right leg was hurting. I even forgot it was coming in the mail, so I immediately took it out the box and starting scraping and pushing the skin and fascia as I watched TV. It worked, who knew. (Shrug)
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not a useful guasha tool
customer_reviews.text: Does not live up to description. It is not made of stainless steel but of some lightweight nonferrous brushed material. The edges are too thick and rounded for traditional guasha practice.
customer_reviews.author: RV Full-timer

customer_reviews.title: it's aluminum
customer_reviews.text: I received an aluminum scraping tool that was labeled stainless steel. This is smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd nut

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with this purchase. I’m mainly using it to massage finger joints to relieve minor arthritis. It’s easy to hold, and fits other places too. I can warm it by placing Under my arm pit for a minute or so. It’s easy to hold & I find refreshing on upper leg muscles & feet. Looks like it will last. Pouch is nice, but I dint think it is real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Emsweller

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: I had such a horrible pain in my heal for over a year. Plantar Fasciitis? I tried everything. I got this metal tool and would grind it into my heal and it would hurt like a son-of-a -gun but it was the only thing that cured it! No pain no gain!
customer_reviews.author: tracy r

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool with so many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a convenient myofacial massage tool for my gymnasts. It's a great tool for loosening up tight and sore muscles. I also use this for facial massages. And it's small enough to fit in a purse!
customer_reviews.author: JVelarmino

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bring blood to the skin
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been doing coin rubbing (Gua Sha Scraping) on me for years. She's Vietnamese and her family has grown up doing it. The idea is that it helps bring blood and toxins to the surface of the skin. This doesn't do anything but massage you. It helps break up knots in my neck and shoulders but does nothing to make the skin red and bring blood to the surface of the skin. I'm keeping it but only for massaging.... not coin rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I hardly review products but this tool cured my 3 years of pain caused from scar tissue in my achilles. It was painful waking up and kept me up at countless nights. Walking hurt,and I could not do the things I loved like basketball, running, and hiking. I didn't want surgery that was suggested to clean up the scar tissue. So after six minutes of uses this tool I didn't need surgery or waste money on gagets that didn't work. It worked for me so it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product description is fraudulent. This thing is definitely NOT STAINLESS STEEL.
customer_reviews.text: The device is made of aluminum which is so soft it can systemically abrade when scrapped against skin. That's why I don't cook in aluminum pots. It's not good for you! The shape of the device is nice, but that is irrelevant as the material is not a appropriate for a medical device.
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this tool
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this tool. I like the weight of it and it has smooth edges which makes it easier to glide over skin even without using oil or lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: So glad i purchased this
customer_reviews.text: So glad i purchased this! Was having physical therapy for plantar fasciitis and they used a much more expensive tool than this. Now that my PT is finished I use this and it works just as well. Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W

customer_reviews.title: Working to ease stiffness and scar tissue around Achilles’ tendon
customer_reviews.text: Use it to scrape around my Achilles’ tendon after rupturing twice and having reconstruction surgery. It has been helping with the scar tissue and stiffness!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Magana

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for a non-professional person
customer_reviews.text: Made in China so you are getting what you pay for and nothing more. This is a an ok tool for personal us. It IS NOT a solid stainless steel tool. It doesn't have that heavy quality feel in your hands. It's definitely not like I will use on a daily basis in my office. But it is something I can refer my clients to for them to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Too thick to use
customer_reviews.text: The product had potential but it is too thick to really get deep into the arm and hand where I need it to. Others I’ve used are thinner and work better for me. Also, when I went to ship back and return they didn’t give an option to credit to my credit card how I paid only to credit my amazon account. When I was at UPS I was told I had to pay $1.50 to purchase the envelope to ship back which I’ve never heard of. This is the first time I’ve had to pay for a return. Won’t buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: linda sigman

customer_reviews.title: Edge is too thick
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as the tool that professional PT uses. As other reviewers said, the edge is too thick. You also feel nothing. Not effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: WZ

customer_reviews.title: Hollow, odd texture, not medical grade stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: I opened this, felt it, and immediately repackage for a return. Unlike real stainless steel, (medical grade I guess is what the description should say)...this has no weight, an odd texture and not effective at all in working the fascia for damaged tissue. This is not what therapists use when you have the Graston technique done on damaged soft tissue. I should have known it wasn’t good quality by the price. Save yourself the trouble and spend two or three times more for a real therapeutic tool that will actually work. Very annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Joy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect tool to use on scar tissue with the use of a massage cream.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a metallic smell to the skin.
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick but leaves a metallic smell to the skin after use. Next one I purchase will more than likely be composite plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: I broke my ankle and had a history of plantar fasciitis. Needless to say, that isn’t a great combination when you’re trying to get your range of motion back. I bought this to try, because my chiropractor used one to loosen up adhesions in my arm when I had frozen shoulder. After one time of using this tool on the back of my calf, my pain is lessened and I have better range of motion already. I look forward to continued use and seeing how this can aid my recovery from the broken ankle/muscle and tendon tightness!
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great I broke up scar tissue in my plantaris tendon
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use on myself
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit harder to use on myself than I expected and I think it's because it is a small tool that it's difficult to grip at odd angles. I've had 3 medical professionals use this technique on me and I think it helps. I have long fingers and maybe that's why it feels small for me?
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this for treating my plantar fasciitis. It was a better substitute for smooth side of a butter knife. The knife was too difficult to hold, and I just couldn't get the angle right. I found this on Amazon, and it just worked so much better. My PT has shown me how to do this.
customer_reviews.author: TheLionRoared

customer_reviews.title: 😫
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball but the spikes are to sharp/ hard. I can't use it because of this . It would be better if the spikes where more rounded
customer_reviews.author: samantha casas

customer_reviews.title: Portable self massage
customer_reviews.text: Along with a good massage lotion this little tool is a powerful travel companion. I whip it out on planes, while riding in the car, waiting in line, watching TV. It fits nicely in your hand. I don't know the proper way to use or hold it, but it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Take out those knots
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed at my chiropractor appointments when he would use the scrapper on my muscles. I would feel such relief to my muscles. I'm glad I've purchased one for myself to use when need in between appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W.

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve pain fast
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice little holder and is easy to use. Helped the tendonitis in my arm and elbow quickly. If my arm feels on fire and tight, I use this tool for a few min and helps the arm loosen up and the bruning sensation go away. Always use ice after to help claim down any inflammation
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality in great design
customer_reviews.text: As a therapist I'd use a tool like this to move tissue & break down scars. This particular one is highest quality I've owned and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyloowho

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my orthopedic doctor
customer_reviews.text: My orthopedic doctor recommended I get one of these for my gluteal tendonipothy. I know I’m spelling that wrong, so sorry!! My husband uses it on both sides of my body and it hurts but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t know what to expect. Works pretty well for a newbie to scraping. Helped ease my husband’s Achilles tendinitis and my bicep tendon flare up. It is on the small side, which is a blessing and a curse if your hands are any bigger than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Chedester

customer_reviews.title: Simple effective tool for rehabilitation.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool in order to work out scar tissue and facilitate healing in my finger. After a particularly nasty break the weeks and weeks of rehab begin. The key to regaining mobility is staying ahead of scar tissue. This tool is affordable and perfectly shaped for working my joints and soft tissue. I am very pleased with the product and its price is very reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Marlin M.

customer_reviews.title: Trying my own PT
customer_reviews.text: Can't get into a therapist so I decided to do my own Graston technique. This is a great tool. Firm and good hand "feel". Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scarab

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for tennis elbow.  Leaves a bruise
customer_reviews.text: Overall this seems to promote healing along with some physical therapy/stretches and other exercises. Blood flow is key to tendon healing, and this tool seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: muscle Scraping
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool and use it on my leg after my surgery. I can't use the force that a professional would to release the facia. But it helps.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Hand therapy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help my hand. I have had problems with my finger locking up. using this product along with stretching exercises is helping . I recommend this product. Good quality and easy for me to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: tina willis

customer_reviews.title: From China....no more!!
customer_reviews.text: If I knew that this was from China, which I couldn’t find any info, I wouldn’t have bought it!!!!!! Sorry, off ANYTHING FROM CHINA!!️!!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.author: kerry mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy piece of steel.
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece. Rounded edges are smooth and don’t dig into skin. I like it, just wish it were bigger and could cover a wider path of muscle.
customer_reviews.author: M the Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can’t break this one
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several of these tools made of quartz, and every time I drop one, it shatters. Can’t happen with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Quality and does it do the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this stainless steel GUa sha very smooth and nice when gliding into my skin I like it has that groove perfect for knuckle and wrist bone area so far I’m happy with the quality nice and heavy and seem to glide my skin effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: C&H W.

customer_reviews.title: Health and healing has no price.
customer_reviews.text: Well when it comes to healing, whatever you use then you gotta believe that it's going to work or help and this for me help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Get in deep
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific massage scraper. If you need myofascial release this is a good choice. Does the job and is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jsmitty

customer_reviews.title: I like this better than the sage crystal one I had
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to find this steel guasha tool. I didn’t even know they existed in steel. I had bought the crystal one prior to this and It accidentally slipped out of my hand and into the sink and needless to say, it shattered into pieces... I don’t have to worry about that with this one because it is durable and also very smooth. I am impressed with the design and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tehmina

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Muscle Groups
customer_reviews.text: The scraping tool is great for those small muscle groups that are tough to get into with a foam roller or stretching. It is slightly smaller than I expected (about the size of my palm) but it works great and is easy to use. I recommend some sort of oil/lotion to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great tool & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! I bought one for my boyfriend who has MS and his feet that hurt daily and I bought one for myself to use for my shoulders/back. Really easy to use and feels amazing afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my physical therapist for use at home on a finger that was triggering. It came in a nice pouch and is easy to use. It has various applications which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not thin
customer_reviews.text: The cheap option but not the most effective. It is not thin so doesn’t quite scrape at the tissue/muscle in the way a medical grade coin does. Noticed the difference in PT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I’ve had stone scrappers in the past and they all broke. This one is smooth but works great. Ended up buying a second one. Great
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Irradicated a headache in 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this massage tool from a friend to rub a spot at the base of my neck for 10 minutes- totally got rid of a nagging headache, so I ordered my own! The product and sheath are both of the highest quality. Pouch is soft, beautiful leather, the massaging tool that I believe is smooth, solid quality stainless steel material that is easy to hold and use. Prompt service, Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Velveeta

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gua sha and massage tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid would have been better it's small enough not to be too heavy or solid titanium.
customer_reviews.author: delk

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product to use as a PT and gives good relief but I also purchased to save my thumbs and sometimes difficult to grip when lotion used .
customer_reviews.author: truebrit

customer_reviews.title: Great way to massage yourself!
customer_reviews.text: It is great on the neck and right below the neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Kristine

customer_reviews.title: compact and effective tool
customer_reviews.text: does the job. makes my shoulder feel great. really breaks up the scar tissue. does its job well
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: handy scraper
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable, varying contours to allow treatment of small or larger areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Scraper
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. From the day I started using this product I have had great relief; no more pain
customer_reviews.author: Achupa

customer_reviews.title: in all it has a good. glide over the
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was,wider.in all it has a good.glide over the skin
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easier to hold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help me with my recent hand surgeries. It is easier to hold than the one my physical therapist uses.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer to my prayers. I'm able to target my scalene muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: So far working great for helping to break up the scar tissue from my accident. Will post more after long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Oden

customer_reviews.title: help for foot pain
customer_reviews.text: it is a bit painful for me as I apply pressure but within a few days I feel pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: We LOVe these.... came back and bought three more!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased four of these for our self-care and comfort. One in each travel bag, one at home and we gave one to family because we wanted to share our awesome find. If you know what scraping is, this tool is the perfect size and sturdiness to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: this product does a good job of braking down scar tissue. it doesn't hurt that bad while you are scraping but the area you are massaging will be sore for days.. which is what you want.! i love the leather bag that it came with
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. One piece so cleaning would not be an issue. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Farah Azarbarzin

customer_reviews.title: Relieved the back pain
customer_reviews.text: The first day I used the tool it relieved my back pain for a couple of days. The pain came back in a few days and I used the tool again and it felt better. Now I'm trying it on other areas of my body such as my face and shoulder. Results pending. I like the tool and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Click buy now lol
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like night and day. Got my order in 24 hrs and used it immediately after I washed it off. Worth every penny must buy. I did my neck and right hip and feel much less pain. Look up YouTube videos this is a game changer I’ll sample all there products for free lol
customer_reviews.author: Edeline Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Massage tool
customer_reviews.text: Used for planer fasciitis. Worked very well. Helps if you have a partner to use it on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for runners, there are many kinds like this, so, hopefully you find one that works perfectly. Use these on the daily for my calves and Achilles because of nots and the “crunchy” sounds I had. However, rolling, massaging and scraping is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of metal, will work in a pinch. But just like many reviewers stated. It does need more of a sharper edge to be effective. Very rounded edges.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality edges could have been polished out a little better.
customer_reviews.text: Fair quality edges could have been polished out a little better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great use
customer_reviews.text: For those deeply stubborn sore muscles this worksike a gem!
customer_reviews.author: Bach10

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is very similar to the one my physical therapist uses to help break down scar tissue from recent total knee replacement surgery. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A Earnest

customer_reviews.title: Decent tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of the tool. Very easy to hold and use. However, very disappointed in the material used to make it. I question if it's really stainless steel or only a cheap aluminum? Very lightweight. Overall useful tool for the minimal cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand massage
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hand therapist and I really like using this tool to massage the palm and the digits. Especially on female hands, the two ridges fit perfectly around the thumb so I love using this to help relieve pain and soft tissue mobilization for my patients. My patients love it so far and it really saves my thumbs !
customer_reviews.author: ksoul

customer_reviews.title: TMJ
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad TMJ and this works pretty good to release facial muscle tension
customer_reviews.author: jack lorch

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for use on self or others. Helps with circulation and smoothing out fascia.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: A nice tool to add to my massage therapy practice and for self care
customer_reviews.text: Reviews I had read said it is more blunted, which is true. It does offer a great extra bit of strength to my hands, helping to get into tougher places that need more attention. Has a nice shape to fit into my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great therapy tool
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I need to do manual therapy on muscular men, I use this. My knuckles doesn't stand a chance against them but this thing does.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and gives great pain relief
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Payne

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little smaller than I expected. It’s easy to use and made of good quality. My other scrapper broke (from another company) so I wanted a more durable one that wouldn’t break if I dropped it, this one won’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Just like physical therapy
customer_reviews.text: This was used on me in physical therapy after a brain procedure. This one with a little cream feels just like physical therapy. Easy to hold and works well on the scar and muscles around the neck. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: chanelle scott

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you researched enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product. Think I need to study more on how to use these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Musselwhite

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, Follow on ig for more tips @sam_shredzz
customer_reviews.text: Liked how easy this product is to use. Great for deep tissues massage and loosening up knots. Very effective for helping to relieve pain and increasing blood flow!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy to use commas in a nice pouch
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy to use commas in a nice pouch
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial product, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is solid stainless steel. I am using for IT band soft tissue mobilization.
customer_reviews.author: Haruo Kusama

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one they use professionally.
customer_reviews.text: This massage scraper feels great. You can turn it different ways to meet your needs. Comes with a lovely pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Destroys fascia in my legs, great recovery tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool works magic breaking up the fascia in my leg, only down side is my hand cramps and gets tired after a little while of using it, but the results are great, i feel better, move better, better blood flow in my legs, i like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Elling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out last night after pulling a double. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to hold, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver for days i don't have physical therapy, it works great for relieving pain, I use it for my arms 💪 , I use coco butter cream with it for less irritated skin, it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. No need to spend more.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Only had for a week and have used it three times. Seems to be good quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! Have used it multiple times already!
customer_reviews.author: Zainab

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knee
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Need to used it over pants or with lotion.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Works as long as you use it regularly
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended but I just keep forgetting to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Gua Sha Scraping Massage Tool - STICKON IASTM Tools Great Soft Tissue Mobilization Tool (B Shape)
feature_bullets: TREATS MULTIPLE CONDITIONS - This soft tissue massage tool was developed to assist in effective treatment of adhesions and scarring brought on by surgeries, injuries, and overuse of muscles.
INJURY PREVENTION & RECOVERY FAST - Use the double-beveled edges to reduce muscle soreness after working out, improve recovery times, and treat soft tissue damage.
MEDICAL-GRADE QUALITY - Crafted with premium medical-grade stainless steel, polished to a mirror- like finish, our massage tools are durable and reduce friction for sensitive support.

BODY MASSAGERS - This tools shape in particular has the most variety of application. It is designed for use on smaller to medium sized areas of the body such as the back, forearms, neck, calves, and pectoral muscles. The pointed design can be used on smaller joints of the body.Used by a chiropractor, physical therapist, Occupational Therapist, Athletic Trainers or Massage Therapist.
SATISFIED PRODUCTS - This Scraping Tool is very versatile and can be implemented using just about any technique. You won’t be disappointed in the quality and performance of this tools.
